comments.body: That's an impressive list, need to spend some time to study and understand how and what works here. Having a followthrough investment after reaching its ATH value would be a gamble given that there's nothing to sustain its market value from falling other than demand from investors. Question is how would it have a consistent demand if there's no use of such coin? Likewise with 'dead coins' which are not actually dead but are having difficulties to make a recovery simply because their mother project is having no progressive development at all. If it is long term holding it would still be huge names which would be a better choice.

Why didn't you average it, because now it's quite an attractive price, which is much lower than the one at which you bought this asset?Good point. Indeed, I forgot to write about it in the methodology. The fact is that I did not plan to invest in Kusama in the long term at all, but bought only to participate in parachains that were relevant in 2021 and there was a lot of hype around. The hype has passed and parachains has completely died, and is unlikely to be revived. I could not sell these tokens after the end of the hype due to the fact that when participating in parachains, they were blocked for 48 weeks. After unlocking, the price dropped very much and I did not fix the losses. I'll wait a few more years, maybe I'll be able to at least break even. Kusama was disappointing to say the least. It is a pity for those who bought for $600, they run the risk of forever remaining under water. There were also parachains on Polkadot, as far as I know, and the conditions there were a bit worse than on Kusama. Polkadot I also see in your portfolio and judging by the fact that you have made several purchases, you have more confidence in this asset?

comments.author: Xal0lex
comments.body: As long as bitcoin's pump will not hit any serious resistance, we will not see the major altcoins pump soon, so under such circumstances, the capitalization and price of altcoins will decrease or show very little growth. The lower the capitalization of the project, the less attention from investors to it at the moment. I see some growth in coins, which are in the very first hundred coinmarketcap, the rest are very sluggishly reacting to the latest events. Right now all the attention is around bitcoin.
